prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Guitar, Bass, Organ, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Guitar, Bass, Organ, and Synth Pad, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Synth Pad, Guitar, Bass, Organ, and Drums, yet Piano is absent.

Style 3:
No Piano is included in this song, but it does have Synth Pad, Guitar, Bass, Organ, and Drums.
